ComicInfo.Title: Things Fall apart- Part 2: "A Rude Awakening"
ComicInfo.Summary: 3 different covers Special thanks to Hasbro's Aaron Archer, Michael Kelly, Amie Lozanski, Val Roca, Ed Lane, Michael Provost, Erin Hillman, Jos Huxley, Samantha Lomow, and Michael Verrechia for their invaluable assistance.Things Fall apart- Part 2: "A Rude Awakening": As the fallout from Prime's leaving the Autobots and surrendering to the humans continues, Ultra Magnus arrives on earth with an arrest warrant for Swindle for his crimes. Meanwhile, Hot Rod's group is persuaded by Hot Rod himself to allow Swindle and the other Decepticons following him to help in building their spaceship which will return them to Cybertron, unaware of Swindle's true motives. To Be Continued...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-03-22 17:20:38. [Issue ID 752282]
